reviewText: Very detailed information about enlightenment and self realization by walking the forgotten path of non violence and meditation.
Truly the best teaching module i ever purchased from amazon. This man is a true master.

This was the best purchase I've made on Amazon! "Path's are many, Truth is one," is so true. This accelerated whatever path I was on like no other supplement or book I've come across on my spiritual quest for understanding. This stuff is the key to living a life the way you should have been all along. Super-duper-highly-recommended for those looking for an enlightened teacher to bestow some priceless wisdom upon them.
